column4: yeah no offense to you, but that was harsh and not something you should have said
regardless, everyone has to start somewhere, doesnt matter what lvl of expertise CaptainMorgan is on... he came in here for a solution, not someone to tell him that his abilities wont allow him to
i didn't say it wouldn't allow him to, just that it might not be the best.  again, my apologies if i offended any one
